text: @MarshaBlackburn A stunt to protect your party and shift blame. If Trump acted quickly, instead of worrying more about his re-election, we would not have 70,000 dead. Trump, you and your #GOPcult members, and Fox News should be the ones sued for downplaying #COVID19 and promoting FAKE cures
